category: Korean University Sports Committee Regulations/Article 7 (Term of Office)
contents: Article 7 (Term of Office) ① The term of office of committee officers and members shall be four years, but they may be reappointed only once. The term of office is not based on the number of days, but rather on the regular general meeting of the Korea Sports Council. However, there is no restriction on reappointment for members below the officers appointed pursuant to Article 5, Paragraph 1. Revised December 26, 2022. ② The term of office of by-elected officers and members shall be the remaining period of the term of office of their predecessor. ③ If a member pursuant to Article 5 is dismissed or recommended for replacement by the relevant organization, the committee shall also automatically dismiss the member. ④ The President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Chairman) may dismiss a committee member whose participation in meetings is less than 50% without justifiable cause. However, this does not apply to members appointed pursuant to Article 5, Paragraph 1. Newly established on December 26, 2022. [This article newly established on May 15, 2017]
